title: Meta’s Zuckerberg plans deep cuts for Metaverse efforts
description: Executives are considering potential budget cuts as high as 30% for the metaverse group next year, according to people familiar with the talks.
content: Meta Platforms Inc.s Mark Zuckerberg is expected to meaningfully cut resources for building the so-called metaverse, an effort that he once framed as the future of the company and the reason for chan… [+3235 chars]
